titleStmt.title: Solomons blessed land a sermon upon Ecclesiastes X.17. Preached before an extraordinary assembly at Newark upon Trent, May 29. 1660. Being the birth-day of our soveraign lord Charles II. King of Engladnd, [sic] &c. / By Samuel Brunsell rector of Bingham in Notting.
titleStmt.author: Brunsell, Samuel, 1619 or 20-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.C. for Henry Seile over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Henry Seile over against St. Dunstans Church
